about_the_game: This is a 3D game. The game simulates a real field environment, with real day and night alternation and variable weather effects. Both in the land and underwater can catch prey, the player in the capture of prey but also beware of the attack of beasts, players can also hunt beasts. There are birds hiding in the grass. These birds can also be caught. Players can climb trees to look for eggs and avoid predators chasing. There are hidden underwater grass fish, these fish can be caught, the water can also hurt the player's creatures . . The catch is carried to a hotel (the house where the game begins) for gold coins, which are used to unlock weapons. . . The game will not only develop, create larger maps and more features to get better results.

These birds can also be caught. Players can climb trees to look for eggs and avoid predators chasing. name: 无敌荒野/Unbeatable wilderness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microft Windows Professional edition 2002 Service Pack 3
  • Processor: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Memory: 60 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Laptop GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio output
  • Additional Notes: The higher the configuration, the smoother the run
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microft Windows Professional edition 2002 Service Pack 3
  • Processor: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Memory: 60 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Laptop GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio output
  • Additional Notes: The higher the configuration, the smoother the run
